title: 1.1465 STATE BEE.
text:
The rusty patched bumble bee, Bombus affinis, is the official bee of the state of Minnesota.
A photograph of the rusty patched bumble bee must be preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.

variables.name: official_bee
variables.description: The official bee of the state.

variables.name: photo_preserved
variables.description: Whether a photograph of the rusty patched bumble bee is preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.

consequences: The rusty patched bumble bee is recognized as the official bee of Minnesota.
A photograph of the rusty patched bumble bee is preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.
